author: The Editors Of Gq Krista Schlueter
title: GQ’s 2017 NBA All Star Party Was Extra Lit Thanks to Russell Westbrook, Chance the Rapper, and Dave Chapelle Photos | GQ
text: GQ’s 2017 NBA All Star Party Was Extra Lit Thanks to Russell Westbrook, Chance the Rapper, and Dave Chapelle X Full screen GQ’s 2017 NBA All Star Party Was Extra Lit Thanks to Russell Westbrook, Chance the Rapper, and Dave Chapelle When you’re in New Orleans, things get a little bit crazier than usual. Which explains how GQ and Nike teamed up to throw an NBA All-Star bash rowdy enough to compete with the pre-Mardi Gras action happening a few blocks away on Bourbon Street. The Roots played an epic 90-minute set with a special appearance from Raekwon (yeah— the Chef himself ). And guests including Russell Westbrook, Anthony Davis, Chance the Rapper, Dave Chapelle, and NBA legend Dikembe Mutombo bounced around the party. Come check it out.
